interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: LANGE HAIR Extendé Conditioning Detangler Hair Spray - Paraben Free Leave-in Conditioner Spray, Detangles and Hydrates Hair, Moisture & Shine | 4OZ
Review Date: 2020/08/25
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Curly, Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Helps protect color and reinforces strands, leaving them strong and vibrant', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 1.4 x 1.4 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '793150592708'}
Review Text: This is another product that I feel unsure about the final results. I have long thick coarse curly hair that fizzes very easily and immediately after every shower if I dont use a product in it. I used this before I used any other products but it did not detangle my hair very much compared to how it normally is. I still had to pull through quite a few knots but it didnt seem to take as many pulls to get through them as it normslly does. So I guess that would be considered an improvement. I feel like my hair is volumized and softer with about 5-7 sprays throughout my entire head of hair. This is a thin spray so it is very lightweight and has the consistency similar to water so I dont feel like my hair is at all greasy from this. I used a curl definer like I always do after showers that helps deter the frizz and keep my curls bouncy and it worked well with it. I dont think this product is worth the money for what little it does do. I wouldnt repurchase.
Review Title: I wouldnt repurchase
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
MUSE & Co Dazzling Rhinestone Stick On Nails, White Nails with Glitter Nails and Rhinestones "French Sparkle", Luxurious Elegant Nails, Squoval Medium Length Nails Press On Nails for Women and Girls Fake Nail Set 36pcs MUSENCO {'Color': 'White', 'Size': '36 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'MUSENCO', 'Style': 'French', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 4.33 x 0.79 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'MUSENCO'} These nails are beautiful for a french manicure but they ended up looking absolutely terrible after applying. I noticed while the nails were still in the package that they had odd chinese like symbols in the glue. I figured it might go away once I put them on but for some of them it didnt. It actually made it look worse and scratchy/bubbly underneath. These "symbols" should definitely get removed. I'm not one who does my nails often at all so I'm pretty critical of these. I included pictures of the flaws for others to see.

Edit: I peeled these off the next day because of how bubbly and gross they looked underneath. They never dried overnight even after sleeping and still moved around when I tried to move them up and down and back and forth. I dont recommend these nails unless you have no other options. I dont recommend these nails unless you have no other options LANGE HAIR Extendé Conditioning Detangler Hair Spray - Paraben Free Leave-in Conditioner Spray, Detangles and Hydrates Hair, Moisture & Shine | 4OZ {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Curly, Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Helps protect color and reinforces strands, leaving them strong and vibrant', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 1.4 x 1.4 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '793150592708'} This is another product that I feel unsure about the final results. I have long thick coarse curly hair that fizzes very easily and immediately after every shower if I dont use a product in it. I dont think this product is worth the money for what little it does do. I wouldnt repurchase. I wouldnt repurchase
profile:
User Profile Summary:

- **Product Type Preference**: Prefers press-on nails, especially elegant styles like French manicures, while also exploring hair care products for specific needs.
- **Aesthetic Appreciation**: Values beauty and elegance in both nail and hair products, leaning towards luxurious options that enhance appearance.
- **Critical Evaluation**: Demonstrates a discerning attitude towards product quality, leading to detailed reviews and high aesthetic expectations, evident in both nail and hair product interactions.
- **Skepticism of Quality**: Experiences disappointment with product performance, resulting in dissatisfaction, particularly related to effectiveness and usability.
- **Low Frequency of Use**: Suggests limited use of cosmetic products overall, indicating these purchases may correspond to occasional care routines or special occasions.
- **Concern for Durability and Effectiveness**: Prioritizes longevity and functionality in products, as indicated by previous reviews highlighting application issues and product performance, including her experience with detangling.
- **Recommendations Impact**: Strongly influenced by personal experiences, will not endorse products that do not meet expectations, reflecting a commitment to quality assurance.

Overall, the user seeks elegant and effective beauty solutions, placing significant emphasis on reliable quality and usability to achieve perfect results for both nails and hair.
